activities:
The mission of Smarterer is to provide a platform to test and score individuals on their professional skills. To achieve this mission, Smarterer offers tests on our website and developer platforms, to enable Users to measure and showcase their professional skills (Services). By registering your account with Smarterer, you voluntarily and willingly provide us certain information, including personally identifiable information, which we collect in order to provide the Services. There are two main types of Smarterer Users: individuals who access our Services for their personal consumption (Consumer Users) and individuals who access our Services on behalf of and at the request of an employer or other legal entity (Enterprise Users). Enterprise Users fall under one of two categories: administrators and test-takers.

Smarterer's activities with regard to all personal information received, including from EU/EEA and Switzerland, is described in our privacy policy located here: http://smarterer.com/legal/privacy.

We notify individuals of what data we collect, and for what purpose, and we describe how it is used. We provide individuals the opportunity to opt out of having their information disclosed to any third parties. We also provide them with access to edit, amend, or delete any information we hold. We take reasonable precautions to protect this information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personally identifiable information such as first name, last name, email address, job title, and geographic location, as well as their scores on Smarterer's skills tests.
